original_text: And when they were gone out of the city, and not yet far off, Joseph said unto his steward, Up, follow after the men; and when thou dost overtake them, say unto them, Wherefore have ye rewarded evil for good?
korean_text: 그들이 성읍에서 나가 멀리 가기 전에 요셉이 청지기에게 이르되 일어나 그 사람들의 뒤를 따라 가서 그들에게 이르기를 너희가 어찌하여 선을 악으로 갚느냐

sentences.original_text: And when they were gone out of the city

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아직 멀리 가지 않았을 때

sentences.original_text: and when thou dost overtake them
Wherefore have ye rewarded evil for good?
